body:
Hi Ji:

What Lars might want to say is to pipe the following output into
rtrace: genklemsample -vd 0 -1 0 window.rad, where vd is the normal of
window.

Best,
Jia



On Sat, Oct 20, 2012 at 8:46 AM, Ji Zhang <hope.zh at gmail.com> wrote:
